segments.text: Hello , Mr . Hammer . Jack Ross here . I'm calling to confirm our appointment on Monday at ten o'clock in your office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to bring Mr . Huang and Ms . Sun with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're supposed to be meeting alone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , but I think they may add something valuable to the discussion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . But no one else , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2
